Pre-Game Insights: The Toronto Blue Jays have a 37-37 record in home games and a 71-78 overall record. Blue Jays hitters have a collective.314 on-base percentage, the sixth-ranked percentage in the AL.
The St. Louis Cardinals have the seventh-ranked team batting average in the NL at.246. The Cardinals are 35-39 on the road and 74-74 overall.
The matchup on September 15 is the third time these teams square off this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series between the Toronto Blue Jays and St. Louis Cardinals is the third meeting in 2024.
